Here is the list of signs with their scores:

7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and balanced, but indecision can stall progress.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and perceptive, but intensity can overwhelm others.
9. Sagittarius - 8.5/10 - Optimistic and adventurous, but recklessness can lead to regrets.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Ambitious and responsible, but rigidity can stifle creativity.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and innovative, but detachment can lead to isolation.
